title: Loan Officer
description: We are seeking a Loan Officer who can assess loan applications, verify client documents, and ensure smooth loan processing.
responsibilities: Meet clients and evaluate loan eligibility
Verify financial documents and KYC papers
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Business, or related field

title: Field Executive
description: We are hiring Field Executives to handle client visits, document collection, verification, and basic loan processing.
responsibilities: Visit customer locations for document collection

title: Customer Support Executive
description: We are looking for friendly and professional customer support executives to assist customers with loan queries.
responsibilities: Handle customer inbound calls and queries
Maintain CRM updates and track follow-ups
Achieve satisfaction and service quality standards

title: Credit Analyst
description: We need an experienced Credit Analyst to review financial statements, assess risks, and support credit decision-making.
qualifications: Degree in Finance, Accounting, or MBA
Analytical mindset with strong financial knowledge
Experience in NBFC or Banking sector

title: HR Manager
description: We are seeking a skilled HR Manager to manage hiring, employee relations, onboarding, and HR policies.
